title: Got DC'd during a game, wouldn't let me log back in
body: So I was about 50 minutes into a game when I disconnected from the server. I tried to do what they notification told me to do but it wouldn't let me log back in. I then tried to restart my client and it wouldn't even let me log in (the client did boot though). Are you guys having server issues? Normally I wouldn't be this bitchy but seriously, that notification for random DC's has been there for over 2 weeks.

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any server issues during this time.  If you're still having issues reach the game servers, give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go.  The steps there should help fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
